```{r include=FALSE}
# Prepare annotations
annot <- read.csv("./merscope_annotTMA1.txt",
                  sep = "\t")
annot$ID <- gsub("^.*_", "", annot$ID)
annot$pair <- gsub("^.*_", "", annot$pair)
annot$pairID <- annot$pair 
annot$replicate <- seq(1, nrow(annot))
rownames(annot) <- annot$ID
annot$excluded <- ifelse(annot$excluded == "excluded",
                    TRUE, FALSE)
annot$IHC_class_ex <- annot$IHC_class
annot$IHC_class_ex[annot$excluded] <- paste0(annot$IHC_class_ex[annot$excluded], "_ex")
tmp <- annot
tmp$ID <- annot$pairID
tmp$pairID <- annot$ID
rownames(tmp) <- tmp$ID
annot <- rbind(annot, tmp)
annot$quality <- "high"
head(annot)
```
